full_summary:
### Regulatory Affairs Support Services

**Tender Reference**: PW-23-01023242 
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: W6369-22-A062/B
**Publication Date**: January 25, 2023
**Closing Date**: March 7, 2024 at 14:00:00 Eastern Time

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Description**:
The Canadian Department of National Defence invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide Regulatory Affairs Support Services under a contract that is expected to commence from the contract award date until March 31, 2025, with the potential for three one-year option periods. This contract is a Request for Proposal (RFP), and the Notice Type requirements are specified in the solicitation package.

**Objective**:
The purpose of this RFP is to acquire a team of regulatory affairs and product development specialists to prepare and file regulatory submissions to meet Health Canada’s regulations for drugs and medical devices.

**Scope of Work**:
The requirements include the services of the following resources:
- Two (2) Strategic Level Resources (Regulatory Affairs Professionals)
- Two (2) General Level Resources
- One (1) Administrative Level Resource

Security Clearance Requirement: Protected B – Reliability Clearance.

**Location**:
The project is located within Canada.

**Closing Date and Time**: March 7, 2024, at 14:00:00 Eastern Time.

**Attachment**: (Download attachments from [CanadaBuy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

### Important Links
* Briefing: [Regulatory Affairs Support Services](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/243d6c0034786dfe8d67838c2320d79b/w6369-22-a062b_-_rfp_-_reg_affairs.pdf)
* Amendment: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/02/8c7099cb3616bff4493910162c450f8a/w6369-22-a062_-_rfp_-_amd_1_-_english.pdf

Note that standard formatting and clarity are paramount to professional technical writing. As such, bullet points have been used when listing the roles and responsibilities for clarity's sake. All non-essential details are condensed and concise for readability purposes.  Also, all links and attachments have been redone, as not
